name: Lazer Ball
description:
The browser version is buggy for some reason and doesnt display some enemies, so it can cause you to seemingly die randomly, but I'm leaving it up as a preview of the game. If you download it, it works.

A game made for a 3-day mini game jam. You have to survive and collect as many points as you can. But be careful! You die instantly if you get hit!

CONTROLS:
  • movement: w,a,s,d
  • shooting: hold left click, hold right click
